abstrac: Experienced Certified QuickBooks ProAdvisor Accountant going above and beyond
bio:
I am a QuickBooks certified for 2018 Online version, 2009 and 2010 desktop versions.  I provide complete bookkeeping and tax preparation services to any type of small business.  I also provide QuickBooks setup and consultation services.  

I have been in business for over 9 years serving various types of small businesses.  I have served e-commerce, adult training school, retail, CAD outsourcing, rental management, and publishing.

I have a Bachelor's degree in Accounting and an Associate's degree in Accounting.  I have worked over the years as an Office Manager, Accounts Receivable Specialist, Full Charge Bookkeeper and an Accounting Assistant for a CPA firm.  

I am proficient in several different accounting software programs, including QuickBooks and Simply Accounting.  I am also very experienced in TurboTax.  I am extremely dedicated to the accounting field and absolutely love the work that I do, giving a higher quality of personal care and attention.

Built on strong ethical values and superb customer service my company is here to help you. I can help make it easier and faster to do your accounting and bookkeeping while providing insight about what you should expect from your efforts. My language is very down-to-earth, no confusing "accountant" talk. I strive to give my best so you can get your best.

I offer bookkeeping and tax services to all small businesses and individuals.  I also provide full QuickBooks support, from set-up to training to ongoing services.  I offer very competitive bookkeeping rates as well as competitive rates for QuickBooks consulting. 

I recognize that all companies are different.  As a result I customize my services to meet my client's needs.  From my very basic to my enhanced bookkeeping services, I am sure to find a suitable solution for your business.

My commitment is to provide the highest level of professional service by always keeping our clients best interest in mind, allowing you to focus on your greatest strength – running your business.

My mission is clear, and is always reflected in my day to day operations:

~Learn everything I can about your business, plans, and goals. Then I will share with you how I plan to assist you with meeting and exceeding those goals

~Maintain a high level of integrity in every aspect of my business 

~Provide excellent customer service 

~Provide high quality, accurate work to my clients at a cost that is within their budget

~Allow my clients the time to focus on the core of their business

My fees are as follows:
$16.00/hour for a minimum of 4 hrs per week.
$100 minimum project budget
Preferred payment is through Guru

bio:
Cherry FinServe is a team of Accounting and Finance professional having an experience of more than a decade in Industry. We offer a full range of bookkeeping and accounting services for small to mid-sized businesses. Depending on your company’s needs, we partner with you as your bookkeeper, accountant or part-time assistant. By partnering with us to help you manage key non-core functions, you can concentrate efforts on maximizing your core business, which is essential to businesses that are positioned for growth.

We are friendly, reliable and affordable professional serving Accounting and Financial services to all types of Businesses.
